reviews.review_msg: I don't know what the bad reviews are about, because she's a great prof who provides a lot of feedback if you approach her for it. Granted, she is more used to teaching upper level courses so to get a good grade you need to learn how to critically engage with readings. Definitely learned a lot from her!
I've never had a class with such beautifully interconnected readings. Her lectures both critically engage texts and draw context around them, her class is one of the best i've ever taken.
